mapper.sql: id, chant_id, worker_id, worker_name, role, login_ip, status, create_date, update_date
mapper.select: SELECT id,chant_id as chantId,worker_id as workerId,worker_name as workerName,role,status,login_ip as loginIp, create_date as createDate,update_date as updateDate FROM login_log WHERE chant_id = #{chant_id} and worker_id = #{worker_id} and 1=1 and status = 0

SELECT id,chant_id as chantId,worker_id as workerId,worker_name as workerName,role,status,login_ip as loginIp, create_date as createDate,update_date as updateDate FROM login_log WHERE chant_id = #{chant_id} and worker_id = #{worker_id} and create_date >=#{create_date_start} and update_date <=#{create_date_end} and 1=1 ORDER BY create_date DESC
select count(id) from login_log where chant_id = #{chant_id} and worker_id = #{worker_id} and create_date >=#{create_date_start} and update_date <=#{create_date_end} and 1=1
mapper.insert:
insert into login_log
id,
chant_id,
worker_id,
worker_name,
role,
login_ip,
status,
create_date,
update_date,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{chantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update login_log
chant_id = #{chantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
worker_name = #{workerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update login_log set chant_id = #{chantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, worker_name = #{workerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
